name: COSMIC EGG
description:
Maneuver your Space Ships to Lift the COSMIC EGG from the BLACK HOLE in the middle of the enemy SPACE STATION and into the safety of your MOTHERSHIP

Between the two Ships you control, there is a special tractor beam that can effect the elusive COSMIC EGG and allow you to lift it out of the BLACK HOLE.

Use WASD and ARROW KEYS to move the ships independently (1 or 2 players).  

Use Buttons and Switches triggered by either your ship or the COSMIC EGG to open doors to get to safety on the MOTHERSHIP.

Will you save the COSMIC EGG? Or will it's elusive nature get the better of you.
